column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Food....I kid you not
column2: it's served FAST!!! Starters came out less than 7min. We ordered Garlic Shrimp and roasted Bone morrow. Remember this
column3: if there's one thing you need to eat here
column4: it's the bone morrow! We've never had before either. Garlic shrimp was on point
column5: thick garlic butter sauce was amazing. Steaks are 5stars
